Name: Eighteen '97
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE kumquats in base of shaker. Add next three ingredients, shake and fine strain into a chilled glass. FLOAT wine.
Review: Looks great and, with the citrus freshness of kumquat combined with the oily character of grappa, it also tastes great.
History: Created in 2008 by Raffaello Dante at Salvatore's at FIFTY, London, England.
